lg.l: Every day seems like yesterday
A routine of growing pain
The shame inside over running me
So I hide inside my shell
Hey man! Don't be afraid -
You better...
Face it! Decide how the story ends
You better Face it!
Don't turn your back on yourself
You've left me behind with these memories
yet all i see is just the blame
Oh please god! Could you make it stop!
Could you help me turn the page
Don't turn your back on yourself!
You better...
Face it! Decide how the story ends
You better face it!
Don't turn your back on yourself
"Save me! Show me there can be another way"
Together, my friend, we will face it once again
Face it
Don't let it bring you down...
